title: Crashing randomly
body: My client keeps crashing randomly. So far I crashed 2 times during champ select and lost two ranked games as a result. It crashed twice during champ select and once while browsing the store.

replies.body: Sounds like there may be some issues between your PC and our servers. Let's confirm everything locally on your network is good by working through all the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If you continue to experience issues after completing those steps, please let me know.
